property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Trope. [Click], remove Trope from the game: Shuffle 1 card from you heap into you stack for each power counter on Trope.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Did you ever notice how everything goes in cycles? The stuff that's cool now was cool before. That's why I keep copy of everything!" -Princess Space Kitten

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, he or she trashes the top card of R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't you hate it when you know everything before it's even out?

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, lose 1[Credits]. When the Corp's turn begins, draw 1 card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just a bunch of knockoffs for the touristos. The real designer stuff isn't sold on the street."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you install Rolodex, look at the top 5 cards ot your stack and arrange them in any order. When Rolodex is trashed, trash the top 3 cards of your stack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I told you to lose my number!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Corp scores an agenda, add Fan Site to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your life is not your own, once you become famous on the Net.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Film Critic can host a single agenda. Whenever you access an agenda, you may host that agenda on Film Critic (the agenda is no longer being accessed and is uninstalled). [Click],[Click]: Add an agenda hosted on Film Critic to your score area.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My gerbil could write a better screenplay."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You are tagged. Prevent all meat damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yeah, we know right where she is. Just pull up Sizzler!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Ronald Five), he or she loses [Click].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's our most pirated property ever. Great work, everyone."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to rez Enforcer 1.0, the Corp must forfeit an agenda. The Runner can spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Enforcer 1.0. [Subroutine] Trash 1 program. [Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage. [Subroutine] Trash 1 console. [Subroutine] Trash all virtual resources.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trash 1 program.||[Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.||[Subroutine] Trash 1 console.||[Subroutine] Trash all virtual resources.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever It's a Trap! is exposed, do 2 net damage. [Subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards. Trash It's a Trap!.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I warned you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a central server. The runner may initiate a run on that server during which he or she cannot jack out. Otherwise, add An Offer You Can't Refuse to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner cannot steal more than one agenda each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Home of Your Imagination.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Award Bait is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Award Bait, you may place up to 2 advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Explode-a-palooza is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Explode-a-palooza, you may gain 5[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's like Lethal Action 3, only with more explosions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, you may pay 1[Credits]. If you do, place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced in a server.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install an agenda from HQ faceup and install Casting Call on that agenda as a hosted condition counter with text "Whenever the Runner accesses this agenda, he or she take 2 tags."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Agenda accessed from this server cannot be stolen unless the Runner already has a copy of that agenda in his or her score area.This applies even during the run on which the Runner trashes Old Hollywood Grid. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install Hollywood Renovation faceup. Whenever you advance Hollywood Renovation, you may place 1 advancement token on another card that can be advanced (or 2 advancement tokens instead if there are 6 or more advancement tokens on Hollywood Renovation).

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trash a card installed in a server and gain 3[Credits] for each advancement token on that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes corps have to bury projects, but that doesn't mean they can't make a profit on them.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Flavor
property.value: EXT. KANSAS - DAY DOROTHY (Miranda) gazes out at the horizon. A sudden gust of wind catches her hair. Above the windblasted prairie loom ominous STORM CLOUDS. DOROTHY: If only I wasn't in Kansas anymore. She begins to hum a haunting melody.
